org.pojomatic.formatter

Interface EnhancedPropertyFormatter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PropertyFormatter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultEnhancedPropertyFormatter, EnhancedPropertyFormatterWrapper

    public interface EnhancedPropertyFormatter
extends PropertyFormatter
    A formatter for a property.

    Any implementation of EnhancedPropertyFormatter must have a public no-argument constructor. A single instance will be created for each property; consequently, implementations must be thread safe.

    Since:
    2.0
    See Also:
    DefaultEnhancedPropertyFormatter

      • Methods inherited from interface org.pojomatic.formatter.PropertyFormatter

        format

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(AnnotatedElement element)
        Description copied from interface: PropertyFormatter
        Initialize the formatter for use; this method will be called exactly once on an instance, prior to any calls to PropertyFormatter.format(Object). This method does not need to be thread-safe. A typical implementation might inspect the element for additional annotations used to configure the formatter.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface PropertyFormatter
        Parameters:
        element - the field or method this formatter will be used for.
